OOC: Cool thanks! :) I was just waiting for Airly to post that Kup was
actu=
ally firing, and what is he was firing at and such. I don't want to
assume =
on this part. Kup might be waiting for the most opportune moment and
so be =
holding fire, or perhaps firing for all he's worth in one shot, or
perhaps =
something in between. So ai am waiting for the descriptive post for
it - un=
less I missed it? Sometimes emails don't make it to my box. :)

Thanks
Pres=
ton
